options.desc: Array of objects with value, label, and disable (optional) props. The binary components will be created according to this array; Props from QToggle, QCheckbox or QRadio can also be added as key/value pairs to control the components singularly

label.desc: Label to display along the component

value.desc: Value of the option that will be used by the component model

disable.desc: If true, the option will be disabled

...props.desc: Any other props from QToggle, QCheckbox, or QRadio

examples: :options="[ { label: 'Option 1', value: 'op1' }, { label: 'Option 2', value: 'op2' }, { label: 'Option 3', value: 'op3', disable: true } ]"

name.desc: Used to specify the name of the controls; Useful if dealing with forms submitted directly to a URL

type.desc: The type of input component to be used

keep-color.desc: Should the color (if specified any) be kept when input components are unticked?

left-label.desc: Label (if any specified) should be displayed on the left side of the input components

inline.desc: Show input components as inline-block rather than each having their own row

...self.desc: The corresponding option entry from the 'options' prop

...props.desc: Any other props from QToggle, QCheckbox, or QRadio
